metadata.title: CVE-2020-26414 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.4. The regex used for package names is written in a way that makesexecution time have quadratic growth based on the length of the maliciousinput string.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
